item.title: Man accused of beheading father and posting video of his severed head to stand trial
item.description: A Pennsylvania man accused of killing his father and posting a video of his severed head online faces trial Monday in the Philadelphia suburbs

item.title: Bodies of all 7 missing people found at California fireworks warehouse that exploded
item.description: Authorities say they've found the bodies of all seven people who had been missing since an explosion at a fireworks warehouse in Northern California
